duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform concrete, steel, and masonry inspection in new and existing buildings.
Review structural plans and shop drawings, and coordinate with engineers on field issues.
Comply with client policies and safety guidelines, including location data, statistical documentation, studies, and surveys.
Complete training on assigned tasks and exhibit basic knowledge of current field inspection practices.
Work collaboratively with other professionals on inspection phases, checks, and tasks.
Exercise responsible and ethical decision-making regarding company funds, resources, and conduct.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma required, Bachelor's degree in Civil Engineering preferred
